about_the_game:
Ah, capitalism, the marvel of our times! Imagine a world where the pursuit of profit reigns supreme, where the sweet aroma of competition fills the air like the scent of freshly printed money. Picture a utopia where every dollar earned is a badge of honor, and the winners of this grand economic game bask in the glow of excess while others marvel at the overflowing abundance.

In the magical kingdom of CapitalismCraft, you get to experience this paradise first hand! Play as a savvy entrepreneur and use your business-acumen to hire lowly desk workers to make you tons and tons of money! Your workers may get demoralized over time, but hey, that's just the reality of the job.

Want to maximize profits? Fire your workers before payday!
Want to sit back and enjoy some passive income? Hire a Middle Manager to do your job for you!
Workers getting harassed by management? Hire an HR person!

So, come join the party! Revel in the glory of CapitalismCraft, where the pursuit of profit is the noblest of endeavors, and inequality is just a side effect of the grand symphony of the free market. Because in this land of plenty, there's always room for more (although more for some than others)!
